```{r, message = FALSE}
library(reglin)
library(tidyverse)

# fixando a semente:
set.seed(1234567890)

n <- 50
sigma <- 2
beta <- c(10, -2)
data <-data.frame(x=rnorm(n))

df <- rlm(~x, data = data, beta = beta, sigma = sigma)
glimpse(df)

ggplot(df, aes(x=x, y=y)) +
  geom_point()


```
